name: backend-based-e-commerce-app-
description: ``` There can be a validation folder and then in that folder, we can separate based on route file(users validation, product validation). ``` ``` Validation can be implemented at route level(means, call function at router level then allow user to move next function). ``` ``` Service files can be separated(Like you can create a services folder and do all the database operations there and call it from controller rather than writing query on controller). ``` ``` Next task is that :  ``` ``` Update profile Get profile Add cart Remove cart Add address Update address Delete address ```
